stanza.line: O me what eyes hath love put in my headhead
Which have no correspondence with true sightsight
Or if they have where is my judgment fledfled
That censures falsely what they see arightaright
If that be fair whereon my false eyes dotedote
What means the world to say it is not soso
If it be not then love doth well denotedenote
Love eye is not so true as all men nono
How can it O how can love eye be truetrue
That is so vexed with watching and with tearstears
No marvel then though I mistake my viewview
The sun it self sees not till heaven clearsclears
O cunning love with tears thou keep me blindblind
Lest eyes well-seeing thy foul faults should findfind
